message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40% - a good deal for you considering the inflation!
Let's meet in the middle, considering the inflation, I think this is a fair deal.
Bob, the value is decreasing for you each round. I'll take a bit more this time, 65%-35% seems fair in this situation.
Given the substantial loss I'm taking from inflation, I believe this split is more than fair. Let's conclude this before it devalues further for me.
Bob, it's getting critical for you now. I'm taking a strong stance, but 70/30 is the best you'll get at this point.
